actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for business gifts awarded to employees by reason of length of service or for safety achievement.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $100 to $250 the business deduction for service awards given to employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for business gifts awarded to employees by reason of length of service or for safety achievement.
